Issue.creator: ashutosh_kumar
Issue.summary: npm audit Regular Expression Denial of Service Vulnerability(package brace-expansion)
Issue.description: restify > bunyan > mv > rimraf > glob > │ │ │ minimatch > brace-expansion │ ├───────────────┼──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ More info │ https://nodesecurity.io/advisories/338 Proposed fix : npm update brace-expansion --depth 8 >
